TAP::Formatter::Console::Session(3pm) Perl Programmers Reference Guide TAP::Formatter::Console::Session(3pm)

NAME

TAP::Formatter::Console::Session - Harness output delegate for default console output

VERSION

Version 3.42

DESCRIPTION

This provides console orientated output formatting for TAP::Harness.

"clear_for_close"

"close_test"

"header"

"result"
